website_summaries.verdict: The second-generation Apple AirPods come with a wireless charging case, but do little to justify their higher price or improve upon the shortcomings of the original model.
cons: In-ear fit and lack of canal seal can feel loose and impact audio
No IP rating for water resistance

customer_reviews.title: Used before!
customer_reviews.text: These AirPods had someone else’s name in the Bluetooth list (Lucy’s AirPods). Which suggests they have been used before. The idea of having something that has been in someone else’s ear is disgusting. These will be returned promptly. Maybe this is why they are only £169.
customer_reviews.author: MR C.

customer_reviews.title: Mine are Fake, not genuine! (Amazon Stock)
customer_reviews.text: The airpods have gaps in the plastic. The charging cable has a cheap coating, cheap square edge connector soldering, a mark on the usb end of the cable. The sound quality is below standard. £170 almost wasted! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: leegolding

customer_reviews.title: exellent
customer_reviews.text: exellent sound, legit apple airpods 2 and all the features working
customer_reviews.author: kieran davies

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging is the best
customer_reviews.text: Person who I give these to just received them today and she is over the moon. I won’t comment on the quality as Apple is always the best. I have the previous version but these new ones have wireless charging function which is even more handy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: e.e

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like them enough to have "upgraded" from the original model. It's still sometimes faffy switching between devices and I would like an easier way to control volume. The issue I have with them is that they misbehave badly with Chromebooks. Now, I'm sure this is the fault of ChromeOS ... however, other bluetooth headphones do not have these issues so I get the feeling the Airpods are too strict where the ChromeOS bluetooth stack may be lacking. Even taking that aside, these SOMETIMES fizz/pop or briefly disconnect when connected to my iPhone X even when it's very close. There seems to be no explanation for this.
customer_reviews.author: Izzard

customer_reviews.title: Good if you are ok with its limitations.
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting perfect sound quality and good sound isolation then these are best avoided. The sound is slightly better than the EarPods and the fit is the same. These have the best wireless connection compared to the others I’ve tried and the wireless charging case is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience.
customer_reviews.text: Only used these AirPods a few times before the left pod stopped working. Despite speaking to Apple tech support and trying to reset them, it seems that the hardware had failed. After sending back to Amazon for a replacement, I am disappointed to find I may have to wait at least 14 days for a REPAIR!! After spending £200 on what should a quality product, I can only describe the product and aftercare as poor.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The sound was okay and would slowly slip out my ear but the right airpod broke within 3 weeks of my purchase. I was actually lucky so I could get a refund for the whole price. I tried everything online but they'll never sound as good as the beats and the gestures were hard to use. I recommend only buying from the apple store
customer_reviews.author: Fayecarrman

customer_reviews.title: Superb 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Their brilliant... fit well... sound is amazing too...,Spot on 😉
customer_reviews.author: Fina Garcia Bello

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW. RECONDITIONED. GOOD LUCK WITH BATTERY LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: These are not new. These are reconditioned. They have been named by someone else! Battery life is now questionable and not comparable with new ones from an apple shop. Have you ever tried to claim against poor battery life?
customer_reviews.author: mmm interesting

customer_reviews.title: Genuine and top Notch.
customer_reviews.text: Totally genuine product. You can see the serial number with in the case and when they connect to your phone the IMEI number comes up straight away to check. I loved the series 1 but wanted the wireless charging ones - that’s the only reason I swapped. Great sound and connect immediately. I couldn’t imagine using any other product other than apples. Great fit and just look and feel too quality. At the price of £169 they’re a steal (plus I had a £50 amazon voucher so cheaper still). A must buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Could not go back to wires now!
customer_reviews.text: Deliberated getting these for quite some time, so pleased with the purchase and could not go back to wires now. Especially impressed how they just paid automatically and battery life is impressive, have not had them run out on me yet and wireless charging case is a bonus! Sound is also impressive, plenty of bass and good across the whole range. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted my own pair of AirPods ! I love them these are real legitimate AirPods especially as these are classed as the ‘AirPods 2’. On the apple website these would be £199 so to get them for the same price as the AirPods without the wireless charging is just great !
customer_reviews.author: Liv Woods

customer_reviews.title: Kept loosing connection maybe it was from a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as told there great like you were in the same room as the person chatting to At first we’re great for 1st week, then kept loosing connection I kept breaking up when talking to people Not a happy bunny as I’m all apple Will try again maybe I just had a bad set from a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: Trev

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for going on holiday and they don't work. Because I was away for 4 weeks I can't get a refund or return. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael G Aspden

customer_reviews.title: These are fake.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 months. Left one stopped working. Was advised to contact Apple store. Went to Apple store and they discovered that the AirPods were fake. It was a genuine box with a genuine Apple serial number, however contents are fake, with a different serial number (not an Apple one) and the advisor at the Apple store pointed out the differences with a genuine set. So now to see if we can get our money back! Amazon said they would remove them From sale until they investigated matters, however they are still available to buy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Biffo

customer_reviews.title: What a shame!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a shame actually got these as a gift for my mum now when purchased it was under someone else’s name also for some reason it kept disconnecting left AirPod headphone didn’t work at all the battery life is questionable what’s strange is someone else bought it new and everything is fine so I’m guessing it’s like a lucky dip bag either get new ones or be screwed and get second hand ones after paying that much you would expect better !!!!
customer_reviews.author: I Ahmed 91

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Losing a star for me because for how expensive they were I was expecting a better quality ear bud. they seem very fineky.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of AirPods. 1st the originals with cable charge. These are better in the fact they connect quicker and can’t say the sound quality is better ( may well be, but I can’t tell ) but they work a treat. Wireless charging works no bother, though in truth not sure it’s a requirement the way it works well with a much bulkier phone. Still, I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kippaxtech

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and heartily recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had been sceptical of the AirPods, as I regard myself as an audiophile, however, I am genuinely delighted with them. They are nothing like as good as my much more expensive headphones, but I do not always want to carry these around with me. The sound quality is not a good as some much more expensive in-ear ear buds, but they hurt the channels of my ears so much that I could not wear them. The sound quality of the AirPods is very acceptable and they stay in my ears and don’t hurt. I really love them and would heartily recommend with.
customer_reviews.author: R B REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: Well it's apple and you can't complain much.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to complain except the price and the support for Android phones. I know that I use one plus but still went and bought this due to my liking towards the sound quality with apple headsets. Would be courteous from apple perspective if they enable similar support controls for Android phones too. After all everybody is Paying the same money to buy the products. Apple can even think about giving these controls to Android users with some extra charge if in case they need money to develop their developing company. After all most of the Android users do like Steve jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Karthick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: When they first came out had no interest in buying these but since upgrading iPhone to the XS I thought why not. love how sleek they look and how quick they connect. I wish the wireless charging case light would stay on to let you know when it’s fully charged but other than that they’re perfect. Always get dirty looks off people who still have the wired ones lol
customer_reviews.author: Callum_R

customer_reviews.title: It’s apple so you pay a premium, but sound is good.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good for casual use and the base is no too bad. It’s more expensive that other true wireless, but I purchased to keep with the apple eco system. The noise cancellation is not great, but I want to still hear my surroundings, so this negative feature is a positive for me
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Jony Ive Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the airpods sound quality, light weight (in your ears 24/7) and design all shout CLASS ACT from the highest peaks, what Apple is going to do now Ive is leaving in beyond me but if this and his Apple Watch are his final gift to Apple then he has left an even greater legacy behind him.
customer_reviews.author: Journalist1

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and mediocre
customer_reviews.text: As usual overpriced Apple product. Bought these for my daughter and she seems to like them. After trying them out I was not impressed with the sound mediocre at best. Easy enough to use but you buy earphones for quality of sound and these just don't cut the mustard. Tried different sound settings and equaliser settings and with different phones and MP3 players, I am just not impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sound - Noise cancellation in traffic not great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound but in traffic, it can get somewhat drowned out. Also, the buds do turn off music if they move so if you are wearing a hud over your head, they can shuffle the buds turning off your music. This is annoying but not an issue if you are not wearing your hood that rubs off the buds. The sound quality is best yet I've heard from a bluetooth earbud set and the double tap to move forward your music is excellent also. Battery life is great, no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Mulhall

customer_reviews.title: Handy but noise reduction I found poor
customer_reviews.text: Use the AirPods with most of my apple equipment in particular iPhone and iPad. Neat little device with easy charge. I found it figity to get them out of the case and a bit slippy. Frightened of dropping them. Sound quality is very good. Much better without the cables. My main moan is the lack of noise cancellation. Sat on the bus and can hardly hear through them. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Mr David P McInerney

customer_reviews.title: The best all rounder
customer_reviews.text: As with Apple products, they just work and everything they do is great. I've tried other wireless earphones, whilst they had better audio quality, they wouldn't stay in my ears as soon as I started walking and no one could hear me clearly on their mics. Knowing EarPods fit me, AirPods would be my next and only choice for a while as the Pro models are slightly to expensive. The audio quality is pretty good all round. At this price you won't get true wireless earphones that have it all like the AirPods. Others may have slightly better audio quality at this price but then they lack good microphones, Bluetooth connection and fitment.
customer_reviews.author: Awayze

customer_reviews.title: First pair went bad!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter insisted on getting these although I personally don't like Apple products. She seemed happy enough with them until 2 days outside the return window one of them packed up! Not what you would expect from a set of headphones costing nearly £200. Phoned apple and was about arrange an appointment instore but then took a chance and called Amazon to see if they would replace outside the return window. To my surprise they agreed so she now has another set so well done Amazon. I just hope these don't go wrong as I haven't got much confidence in them now.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: It's apple, could be better, even they know it
customer_reviews.text: It is very bad for noise cancellation, it doesn't fit all as they make you think, so it may fall off your ears all the time. That's why they made the "pro" one. To fix what they knew was wrong on the first one but they didn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: issue with left
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product overall and the price however the right Airpod is broken and has distorted noise/lower volume. Compared it with another set (my wife's) and her sound quality was a lot better on both Pods. Seems to be an issue with the right Airpod and might have to take it to apple store otherwise contact amazon
customer_reviews.author: rollmesome

customer_reviews.title: Great little headphones and best I’ve used by far!
customer_reviews.text: First pair I have ever bought and I wondered if they were worth the money. Highly expensive but you only get what you pay for and these are amazing! Sound quality is perfect in every way . So comfortable you forget you have them on. I paired them with my iPhone 7 and it worked easily within 5 mins from start to finish. I also paired them with my APPLE TV and you can control the sound using the remote control which is brilliant. You can get right into a movie or tv programme like music concerts etc using these. Tried with a Firestick but quality was intermittent at best.
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was put off by some of the reviews initially but weighed up the fact that it was being sold by Amazon. Received them and they are clearly brand new, no issues at all and £50 less than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: CH - Newbury

customer_reviews.title: Original Airpods sold by Amazon! 💯❤️
customer_reviews.text: These airpods sold by Amazon are original (NOT FAKE)! They sound and fit just like the wired apple earphones that comes in the box when you buy an iphone. It’s a perfect fit for me plus the battery life lasts the whole day; I even fall asleep with the airpods on and it doesn’t die overnight (probably not a safe thing to do 😅). Definitely an excellent buy because these are much cheaper (£159) than the ones sold in apple stores (£199) in spite of being exactly the same item. I’m definitely glad I bought it here! 😍💯
customer_reviews.author: I Tabios

customer_reviews.title: Does what one expects
customer_reviews.text: I bought these AirPods mainly to use with my MacBook, and I have been impressed so far. Setting them up initially was easy enough, although it took a bit of effort to connect them for a few days afterwards - although eventually that hassle went away and they automatically connect when in my ear as promised. The sound quality is good, ultimately it’s never going to be 100% the same as professional quality headphones but for listening to music or watching videos it gets the job done well, and the noise cancelling works well too. Overall I’m pleased with the AirPods and just hope they last long enough to justify the initial price
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: There really is no alternative to Apple's own airpods
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have tried cheaper versions of the AirPods and have really wasted my money over the last few months. I finally decided to go for Apple AirPods with wireless charging and I’ve realised there really is no alternative. If you want the best, you’ve got to pay for it. These are reliable, very high quality, with excellent sound, a long battery life and instant connection to your iPhone or iPad. Forget the cheaper versions, there really is no alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Taralouise

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a while before writing a review to see if they would perform to their full ability over time. I purchased these in the beginning of the year 05/01/20, they arrived 3 days later with premium delivery. Wanted the legit thing so of course bought Apples original. They’re amazing, cannot fault them. Their performance is 10/10. Blocks out sound, fits perfectly in ears, charges quickly and the battery life is fabulous! So happy I purchase these- best necessity for working out/gym too!
customer_reviews.author: Amica Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price, I am now a convert.
customer_reviews.text: My son has had a set of the original Airpods for years, and I've always been a little dubious whether they are worth the price, but I've got to say that they are well worth the price, I am now a convert. They don't block all af the ambient noise, but I think that is a good thing. Sound quality as you would expect from a premium headphone is good. Battery lasts well and are quick to charge from the case. The highest praise I can think to give is that if I lost them tomorrow I would immediately buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Apple’s earphones are generally poor quality and I was really sceptical about these but the sound quality is really good. I had concerns about them falling out as most earphones without the mushroom tips won’t stay put even walking around but these sit very comfortably. They are probably apple’s best to date. They aren’t in the same league as Bose or high end Sony but certainly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rimmer72

customer_reviews.title: Prime quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm quite impressed. The sound quality is first class. The bass is really rich and deep, heavy ( testing on ALEPH - Monolith). It's really comfortable in my ears. It's stays connected for a fair distance walking away from the phone doing stuff.. Siri voice activation works well. The double tap could have been more sensitive, sometimes I have to tap multiple times for "next/previous" tracks. Overall really happy with the product if you looking for the best wireless earphones up to date you are in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Only had them 5 months and left one has stopped working. Always thought it was a bit quieter but put it down to certain songs being that way, but then for past month or two have had problems where it would take a while to connect the left one and I’d have to keep putting in and out of case to get it to connect and play music through both.
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: Unable to connect to any Apple product, I charged, tried to rest but nothing. My iPhone and iPad would not connect or even see the AirPods. After and hour of trying they are back in the box waiting to be returned ! I think it’s best to go to Apple direct and spent the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Newm

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. So easy to connect with my iPhone/iPad/MacBook Air/echo dot/TV etc. Out of the box & they found all Bluetooth near them for me to pick quickly. Happy with the sound quality too. I did think about cheaper versions, as I didn’t think I’d use them that much, but glad I went for these instead & I use them daily now as I love them so much
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: They're Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it took me awhile to decide to buy Airpods. After reading alot of positive and a few negative reviews im glad i did, im on android and as long as you leave your bluetooth on they connect automatically as soon as you open your case and take an earphone out. No more ripping my earphones out of my ears. They're a great fit, better sound quality than wired earphones, battery lasts for the full time advertised and they charge super fast with the charging case. They cost alot but genuinely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Price is expected, the quality isn't!
customer_reviews.text: 4 hour battery life is just terrible for people who may want to use these while they're working. The false advertising of 24 hour battery life only refers to putting the airpods inside the case and recharging them. Noise cancellation is non-existent. For the price you pay, these really aren't worth the plastic they're made from.
customer_reviews.author: Rahi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sounds reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Having a pair of £350+ Noise cancelling headphones from a famous maker I considered these performed equally well. Not the noise cancelling version so can’t rate that. Holding them against iPhone shows remaining charge. Relatively expensive but well worth cost.
customer_reviews.author: hopper40

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: When it says Apple you know your getting a quality product. Having the wireless case gives you extra charge power when out and about. Easy to connect and use. Comfortable in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: AirPods were not in the box
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with the AirPods in the box as advertised, and Amazon Support would not issue a refund or replacement because of 2 days. Completely unacceptable. It doesn't appear to be an uncommon problem either, so just purchase this product from Apple directly.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Primett

customer_reviews.title: Great for shutting teenagers up *****
customer_reviews.text: Bought for stroppy teenager who is never without them. Which means less arguments. So if the lack of whinging and whining is what is meant by noise cancelling full marks from me!
customer_reviews.author: It is I

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with wired earphones that break constantly and headphones to big for my head, I thought I'd try wireless bluetooth earphones after a friend of mine highly recommended them (having purchased them herself). The earphones were packed securely and they look exactly as they do in the pictures. I haven't had any problems with them as of yet but I would suggest buying earphone cleaners of some kind as it's recommended from time to time. The battery life of both the earphones and the charging case are very good, could last up to four days without being charged up, depending on how much you use them during those days.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Collyer

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with my phone and found out it was called ‘TWS R100’ which is a dupe you can buy for $9. I’m very disappointed having paid over £100 for them to be fakes! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while on sale on Amazon and the wireless charging case is helpful though as the case needs charging itself it may not be worth the extra money to everyone. The sound quality is great and there is good noise cancellation, they connect straight to your iPhone once placed into your ear which is really handy. Every time you open the case near your phone it shows the battery level of the AirPods and case on the iPhone which is also helpful. I do feel they run out of battery quite quickly especially if you use them a lot in a day and the case is easily scratched so I recommend getting a protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Hope you get lucky
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine AirPods but they’re either refurbished or haven’t passed checks to be sold in store. These are my second pair. My first pair had dents and marks where the lid meets the case they also had someone’s name when I connected to them, I had a replacement sent and the second pair is even worse, the lid hasn’t been fitted properly it jiggles and rattled around in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent, for classical, pop or the spoken word. The fit into the ears is good and they stay in no problems in the gym or going for a run, doing gardening etc. Charge quickly and having the case as a portable charger is design genius. Now one of my essentials, I love them. Costly but quality product.
customer_reviews.author: DRPCM

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them
customer_reviews.text: Had my eye on these for a while but was hesitant - after all no issue withe wired ones. Finally I gifted them to myself and I'm happy I did. They fit well, much more convenient when out in walks, or exercising. This model has no noise cancellation. The sound quality is good and as long as you keep them in the case, no risk of loosing them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great genuine Apple Product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong really. Cheaper than the price you would expect to pay in an Apple Store but by far worth the money. Great product, excellent sound and good for everyday use. Case can get scratched rather easily so avoid putting it near anything sharp whether that’s in your bag or pocket. In terms of delivery, AirPods was stolen twice. The box was delivered with nothing inside but an open, empty Apple AirPods box. However Amazon was very quick to replace and give a goodwill gesture etc. Apart from that great, cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sher_d21

customer_reviews.title: Original product. Bought 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine; I contacted Apple and had the serial number checked. Second pair I own. Bought this set for my daughter. Stay in my ear comfortably while at the gym unlike other sets I’ve had. Good sound if lacking a little on base sounds due to them not having any silicone buds to seal the ear.
customer_reviews.author: R Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Used AirPods, falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Mis sold product - these are not new AirPods they have arrived and were already named ‘Ed’s AirPods’. It is clear they were repaired and not even properly as the AirPods don’t hold their charge... within a week I have gone to run and AirPods been on 0% despite being on charge the night before. Feel let down by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I have the first iteration of these and loved them, so bought er indoors the new ones with the wireless charging. Absolutely excellent, and so convenient just leaving them on the pad by the bed so they are always ready. She uses her for the phone calls too, and much better as she now hears everything clearer!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Much more background noise than my BOSE headphones but more discrete when out walking. The left pod does have a tendency to "lose contact". It must be a known problem as there is plenty of advice online as to how to remedy it. Soon rectified when it happens but quite annoying. Not Apples best product in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: kevin herbert

customer_reviews.title: You only get what you pay for 👍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, base good and clear , can’t fault them. Love them 👍
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price..
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and so worth the price. I can wonder around my flat doing say housework while listening to music. Once done, put them back in the case and they charge up! The case doesn’t need charging very often. 🙃 Deffo add apple care as covers you for faults and repairs. Also if you take them out and about make sure you store them somewhere safe as they can be easily lost!!
customer_reviews.author: PinkyLilac

customer_reviews.title: Great - If you don't want to talk to your kids
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is getting kids to take the airpods out of their ears - conversation is now a thing of the past - so they must work well
customer_reviews.author: Simon R

customer_reviews.title: Only works reliably with other Apple products
customer_reviews.text: They are good if you only plan to use them with an iPhone. I also use them with a pixel 3a, they loose Bluetooth connection, and often can't be found when you turn on the phones Bluetooth. I know it's not the phone as I have beats headphones that work with all devices with no issues. Battery life is ok
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered. Can be a little irritating in the ear over very long flights However they offer plug and play compatibility with all Apple kit. Also quick and easy changing from use on one device to another. Recommended if you are in the Apple eco-system.
customer_reviews.author: Phony Bliar

customer_reviews.title:  empties your wallet
customer_reviews.text: They’re great, they’re not noise cancelling at all, they’re comfy and the battery last a while - all good. Not sure they’re worth £160 though but hey, that’s 
customer_reviews.author: Lee Scrafton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and product
customer_reviews.text: I resisted these for a while as I didn’t want to own another item that needed charging. But I can tell you now, they are amazing. Great sound, portable, hold their charge and they integrate with Apple software brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: SolihullBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased with high expectations and still impressed
customer_reviews.text: Had heard good things about the apple airpods but was still very pleased with the product! They sit very well in ear and the sound quality is excellent. These are not noise cancellation but still do a pretty good job blocking out background noise when using. Even work well when exercising! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lexip37

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Apple
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for V1 none wireless case charging These were £50 cheaper than at Apple I was buying v2 none wireless from Apple and these are V2 Wireless case for less money great deal I only looked because Apple were closed for lock down I check here 1st from now on
customer_reviews.author: ivor bigun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair of these, and my wish came true,, so easy to set up with phone,, charging is simple and your phone will tell you the battery life of these,, 5 hours of continuous playback and perfect for my car journeys up north,, really pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant airpods
customer_reviews.text: Love the AirPods and it’s magnetic holder. Neat and compact. Excellent sound from air pods. Only recommendation is to check Bluetooth is on and they are connected to your device otherwise you're sat there in silence while sound comes out of speakers for everyone else to hear!
customer_reviews.author: juliemayatkinson

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Apple product
customer_reviews.text: Read some horror stories of preowned AirPods or no AirPods all together but the ones I received are the 2nd generation AirPods. They came packaged as if I’d bought them from the Apple store but at a far cheaper price. Fantastic sound and I only gave the sound cancellation as 1 star as Apple themselves will tell you this isn’t a feature. Can’t recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: David Tripney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. They connect with my apple iPhone straight away and they cancel out mouse perfectly. One tiny problem, they don't feel secure in your ear but I have gone on runs with them and they didn't fall out. However don't use it until gymnastics whilst doing flips and whatnot
customer_reviews.author: Aasma

customer_reviews.title: Proper Apple Airpods 2nd Generation !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the new AirPods 2nd generation. The best headphones ive ever had. i got these for holiday and i can honestly say i didn't once have to charge them up on low battery. the sound quality is very good. with the charging case wireless there worth every penny. connect very easy to your phone or device. One little niggle it only skips track and play/pause with 2 taps the one headphone. i would of liked to be able to skip back or restart track but other than that great product must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Best buds.
customer_reviews.text: Since I got these, I’m doing more exercise! Dam you Apple were supposed be in lockdown all I want to do is put my earbuds in and go for a walk. Seriously, sound better than the wired earbuds but are so much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S

customer_reviews.title: The functionality alone is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Had several different pairs of wireless and true wireless headphones in recent times to use with my android phone. Made the jump back to iPhone with the 11 pro and got these to compliment them. The sheer simplicity in connecting, pausing, playing. It’s just worth it. Was going to opt for the AirPods pro but prefer theses as find proper in ear headphones invasive to my ear canal. Sound quality is very good. Obviously there is a lack of noise cancellation compared to the more invasive in ear products but these do the job required. I use them every day. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a year but I’ve used them less than 20 times but the left one has always had lower sound quality and just overall isn’t good at first I thought it was my own hearing but now reading other reviews I’m starting to think they’re fake. Bought from amazon with genuine Apple box and serial number but They’re ridiculously bad
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many earphones, earbuds etc and these are by far the best all rounder. Sound quality is very good but for me the difference to others is the comfort, convenience and ease of connection. Best thing I have bought for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bernbut

customer_reviews.title: Great product but don't use wireless charging much
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on sale as they were the same price as regular (non-wireless) AirPods. They are great and the sound quality is good. Alas, I haven't used the wireless feature much and frankly wouldn't pay more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Demos James

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product but mine were marked and scratched
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they were a bit cheaper than else where, they work well but noise cancelling is poor, my were delivered but the case and one of the ear plugs were unfortunately marked and scratched, it was a shame I’m not sure they were brand new?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Oozes quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these AirPods. Sound quality better than standard Apple free-issue headphones. Ear fit excellent. Connection to iPhone as easy as it could possibly be. Great for phone use. Love the little charging case and battery status indicator. Great with a wireless charger. Downside. Not cheap. And look a bit odd dangling out of ones’ ears!
customer_reviews.author: pete d

customer_reviews.title: Superb audio equipment
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of audio equipment. Recommended by a friend and I am so pleased with them. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Apple product
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain, saved £30 off the retail price and it’s not even Black Friday. No wires, Bluetooth, small carry case, excellent quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Marke

customer_reviews.title: Was given a fake pair
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this 5 star if I received the correct item. When my package arrived, the seal of the box had already been teared off and I received a pair of £20 fake ones instead. I’m a regular amazon user and this is not only the most amount I’ve ever spent on the site, but also the first time anything like this has ever happened to me. I’m very upset and am suddenly dreading Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wicked
customer_reviews.text: Apple headphones just seem to fit my ears very well and the sound quality has always been good enough for me. I used to go through about 4 pairs of the wired headphones a year so making the jump to wireless was a no-brainer; they’ll pay for themselves in no time. It’s the best purchase I’ve made in a couple of years, out of all the apple products (love them or hate them) this is their magnum opus
customer_reviews.author: Kuribe

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as AirPods 1
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as my original AirPods. These irritate my ears after a while - whilst the others I hardly felt even after hours of being worn. Inner edges feel less refined and rounded.
customer_reviews.author: J Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Totally converted to AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughters birthday she loved them. I was then converted and ordered a set for myself and I am totally converted! Top quality easy to charge but they have a good battery life
customer_reviews.author: amanda jane smith

customer_reviews.title: Great airpods
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other ear pods, but always come back to Apple airpods, the sound quality is excellent and easy to use. I would recommend these to anyone who is looking into get a quality ear pods.
customer_reviews.author: harvestmoon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Well built product, neat charger, comfortable to wear and great for gym or any fitness activities. Works well with my Sony Xperia phone. Sound quality is alright, but nothing to write home about. , Sound isolation is pretty poor however. Overall great product but maybe consider looking at Samsungs earbuds as well, as those are half the price...
customer_reviews.author: Germans K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wow! these are better than I could have hoped for. I love Apple product`s and these are on exception. I`m using these with an Apple watch series 5 and my I phone. Sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Original and best.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some of these for ages but wasn’t keen on buying other, cheaper versions of which there seem to be lots of. So finally brought them and I’m very pleased. Connected in seconds and the fact I can put them back in the case to charge is very useful. They are expensive yes but you pay for quality
customer_reviews.author: P. Finch

customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. Bought them to upgrade from my first generation pair. The sound quality is amazing and clear all the time. The battery is extremely impressive. I’m always listening to music when I’m out or at school and I only charge them up once a week
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, not so great mic, with non-apple devices
customer_reviews.text: The item didn't arrive on time and may have been lost in the post. If so I recommend asking for a refund and repurchasing, as that worked for me. The mic is pretty good, when outside however it picked up the cars driving past more than my voice and it's not the most sensitive mic. The sound quality however is really good and great for listening to music even if not paired with an IPhone it all works however the pairing may take a while as I found.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Chen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money for the mid priced AirPods a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas he was over the moon with them, he likes them so much that they haven’t left his side, he takes them everywhere, extremely pleased with them, would highly recommend them to anyone! So glad I bought these middle range one though wouldn’t have bought the cheaper Apple series 1 I personally think these are the best mid priced Apple AirPods!
customer_reviews.author: sally A B

customer_reviews.title: Happy Little Bunny
customer_reviews.text: Bit the bullet and brought these because wireslwas ones I’ve had before I’ve had problems paring them. You definitely get what you pay for well presented and packed. Absolutely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Vennell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Having owned the Sennheiser Momentum TW earphones, I had very high expectations for how these would perform: they surpassed every expectation I had! The sound quality is superb, and the comfort is second to none. If these fit your ears, they fit your ears so well. If you own any device capable of bluetooth (but especially an apple device), these are a must-buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karam Karrar

customer_reviews.title: Really good product beautiful arrived on time on well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I could add really when commenting this is very popular product, I have bolted with Amazon and I'm quite happy to have received it on time and well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Hank Samuel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as present for my wife. During lockdown, she is working from home. Being a Psychotherapist, what would normally be face to face meetings, became calls. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Used it interchangably with an iPhone and an Andriod. It connect to both devices relatively easy however, word of warning: I've noticed that sometimes my airpods wouldn't connect to my andriod and would sometimes disconnect without my input. It can be fixed by connecting the airpods to an Apple device e.g. an iPad. If you're not part of the Apple ecosystem already, I recommend going else where.
customer_reviews.author: caz

customer_reviews.title: Love my AirPods
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of AirPods...I gave my first pair to my niece. I actually love my AirPods but the pair I was sent seemed to be defective. I returned them for a replacement. They are so convenient and after a few wears, comfortable. I would definitely recommend although I wish they were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: NAA

product_meta.title: Apple Airpods with Wireless Charging Case
feature_bullets: Universal fit that’s comfortable all day
Can be charged either wirelessly using a Qi-compatible charging mat or using the Lighting connector
Easy setup for all your Apple devices
Quick access to Siri by saying “Hey Siri”
The Wireless Charging Case delivers more than 24 hours of battery life
